attributes.action: Instant remand for anyone that commits a sexual offence against a child
attributes.additional_details:
Too many of these individuals are being given bail back into the community where our innocent children are.
We all have a duty of care to protect our children and we ask the Goverment to please debate our petion and think about the children.
attributes.background:
Instantly remand in prison anyone who has committed a sexual offence against a child in scotland.
The people of scotland ask you to please regard our petition and help keep our children safe.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish courts and Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
